news_header: Nearly 30 immigrant bodies found in Libya.
news_original_title: Libyassa löydetty noin 30 ruumista – viranomaisten mukaan kuolleet olivat siirtolaisia
news_text: In Libya, local authorities and the Red Crescent reported the discovery of nearly 30 immigrant bodies in the west and southeast of the country. Nineteen bodies were found in three graves on a farm in Jikharra, identified as victims of illegal migrant smuggling. Additionally, ten bodies were located by volunteers near the site of a sunken ship off the port of Zawiya. Libya has become a key transit point for migrants attempting to reach Europe via the Mediterranean.
